runInclusionStatistics.description: Generate and export statistic on the cohort inclusion rules?

runIncludedSourceConcepts.description: Generate and export the source concepts included in the cohorts?

runOrphanConcepts.description: Generate and export potential orphan concepts?

runTimeSeries.description: Generate and export the time series diagnostics?

runVisitContext.description: Generate and export index-date visit context?

runBreakdownIndexEvents.description: Generate and export the breakdown of index events?

runIncidenceRate.description: Generate and export the cohort incidence  rates?

runCohortRelationship.description: Generate and export the cohort relationship? Cohort relationship checks the temporal relationship between two or more cohorts.

runTemporalCohortCharacterization.description: Generate and export the temporal cohort characterization? Only records with values greater than 0.001 are returned.

incremental.description: Create only cohort diagnostics that haven't been created before?
